channel.title: Need help realy bad
channel.description:
Hi my names jamie and i realy need help with getting one thing done to my rsps. Right so what i want done is: When my staff members do ::yell (message) it shows up on the chatbox in colours. But i realy dont have a clue on how to do this so could someone please help me with this. i want this done asap because i have been trying to do this for like 6 months now and its stressing me out .
thanks to who ever help me.

item.title: Need help realy bad
item.dc:creator: @jamiehogo jamiehogo
item.description:
@jamiehogo wrote:

yes i have already tryed that i think that it could be somethink to do with the client side aswell im not sure but i realy need a good coder to either tell me how to do it good or just to help me do it on team viewer i dont realy mind aslong as i get it done and if the person that helps me get it done i might even give them a reward for doing so.
so can someone help me pleaseeee.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help realy bad
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

TheCyberMan:

Use @red@, @blue@, etc.[/quote]That is for the older PI’s. Nowadays DSPK’s are used. Use [quote=“Venge Drop, post:4, topic:415650”]have you tried <col=255><shad=030303>? make sure you put in in the correct place to.

Read full topic
